mapper.sql: a.cfg_id AS "cfgId", a.cfg_type AS "cfgType", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.carr_id AS "carrId", a.channel_id AS "channelId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_channel_carr_not_deliver( cfg_id, cfg_type, city_id, create_time, province_id, carr_id, channel_id ) VALUES ( #{cfgId}, #{cfgType}, #{cityId}, #{createTime}, #{provinceId}, #{carrId}, #{channelId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_channel_carr_not_deliver SET cfg_id = #{cfgId}, cfg_type = #{cfgType}, city_id = #{cityId}, create_time = #{createTime}, province_id = #{provinceId}, carr_id = #{carrId}, channel_id = #{channelId} WHERE id = #{id}
